tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
========================== Rdata parser ========================== **What it does**
The Rdata parser tool allows to extract informations from a binary R file in .RData format.
More informations concerning R Data format and save / load functions can be found here: http://www.sthda.com/english/wiki/saving-data-into-r-data-format-rds-and-rdata.
|
**How to use it**
First use the Rdata reader tool to get the list of dimensions available in the binary file.
Use the reader tool output to select the dimension(s) you want to extract.
If the selected variables can be displayed alongside in a tabular files the option \"Bind\" will attempt to do so.
